sentences.sContent: Comparison of tnf content in intestinal mucous membrane homogenate between groups.
sentences.sContent_eng: Comparison of tnf content in intestinal mucous membrane homogenate between groups.
sentences.sCn: 各组肠粘膜匀浆中肿瘤坏死因子含量的比较。

sentences.sContent: Objective To compare the efficacy and safety of ivermectin with metronidazole in patients with intestinal acariasis.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective To compare the efficacy and safety of ivermectin with metronidazole in patients with intestinal acariasis.
sentences.sCn: 目的比较伊维菌素与甲硝唑对肠螨病的治疗效果及安全性。

sentences.sContent: The eggs of intestinal schistosomiasis can be detected in faecal specimens through a technique using methylene blue-stained cellophane soaked in glycerine or glass slides.
sentences.sContent_eng: The eggs of intestinal schistosomiasis can be detected in faecal specimens through a technique using methylene blue-stained cellophane soaked in glycerine or glass slides.
sentences.sCn: 通过一种使用将亚甲基蓝染色透明纸浸在甘油中或放在玻片之间的技术，可在粪便标本中发现肠血吸虫病的虫卵。

trans.tranOther: Intestinal means relating to the intestines
